content.p: The 2.0 Release of Carrot2 brings a lot of additions and improvements to the core framework, components and applications:

ul.li: Major refactoring and simplification of the core API, removal of obsolete interfaces.
A brand-new search clustering web application featuring a more usable user interface, much faster back-end and better support for adding new data sources.
A major speed improvement of the build scripts.
A new look for the project website.
Added support for incremental document pushing to the carrot2-input-lucene component.
